name: Ricoco On Ice
description:
Ricoco On Ice is a 2D puzzle game based on Sokoban.

The goal is to put cubes on the target cells. You can only push one box at a time, and be careful, you can't pull them. The challenge, in addition to completing a level, is to resolve it with the least possible stroke. 

Use the wagons to get in the way of the ice blocks' trajectories!
